TEXT.S: = Posko = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Yurisyang ka alang Posko. 148 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 378 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 42% niqan 159 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 58% niqan 219 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis33%, Bunun5%, Truku1%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq2%, ni rahuq na o2%.
